posts.content:
been looking at this van with a view to bidding but have looked up titian red and don't look anything like the same someone has suggested its red oxide primer? can you tell from pics item no 141789985932 if its anyone van on here not trying to do anything other than be sure of what I could be buying
cheers........

I'm no expert but it is matt so that's different as well as it looks more like sealing wax red to me. I would want photos of the underside as well as what it looked like before the paint went on. Could be kilos of filler underneath. I'm sure other folks here will have other suggestions but that what I see a quick glance.

Looks like a rattle can job to me, can see a non standard colour blue in the door shuts and what looks like white under that.
Tread carefully could be a filler monster
